Meta.title: More Loot
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
这个mod提供了一个BepInEX配置文件 sosarciel.moreloot.cfg 允许修改: 击杀Boss后掉落的宝箱数量 进化怪物的生成概率 额外的基因掉落率 是否允许队友或居民掉落额外的基因(原版玩家阵营不会掉落基因)
注意, 所有选项默认都不启用 你需要手动在游戏安装目录的BepInEX配置 (如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.moreloot.cfg")内更改配置使其生效
This mod provides a BepInEX configuration file sosarciel.moreloot.cfg that allows you to modify: The number of chests dropped after defeating a Boss The spawn probability of evolved monsters The extra gene drop rate Whether allies or residents can drop extra genes (by default, player faction does not drop genes)
Note: All options are disabled by default. You need to manually change the configuration in the BepInEX config directory within your game installation folder (e.g., "SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.moreloot.cfg") for them to take effect.
